dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Young-ji hasn't shown up for this conference as well.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: I heard he's been officially invited by a Wing. This is probably the second time.
You don't happen to know which Wing it was, do you?
No one seems to know.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Why are you displeased about it? You're the one who turned down Brother Young-ji's offer to go with him, Dongbaek.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: There's no need to be so fixated on the number nine. What if there are eight or five of us?
Say, Dongrang... How long are you gonna stick to your vet routine?
I made precious time in my packed schedule to check out what Young-ji's group was like... and all I see are children's playthings.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Oh, it's been a while, Nul-in. It's a pleasure to see a fellow from my hometown here.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You arrived here later than we did, but it looks like you adapted much faster.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: But I must say... It's a bit disheartening to hear you call them children's playthings.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You won't be saying that once you learn that animals feel pain exactly like we do.
Well, I'll take my words back if those animals start repaying the kindness by bringing money or something~

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Nul-in, do you take this for a gaudy auction where technology is sold for cash?

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: You didn't even care to cast a glance at us mere months ago, calling illuminators' conferences out of fashion... Have you come now to rake off a piece of the profit you're smelling?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Dongbaek...

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Don't mistake it for covering for you. I just don't want to see her face, that's all.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: By the way... What made you so passionate about curing animals? They can't pay the bills or anything. How are you gonna make a living?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You like to nag a lot. Well, I suppose I could run a chicken restaurant?

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: What?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Hear me out for a second. I could make chickens grow tons of wings... and cut them off without inflicting any pain.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: They only need a single pair to fly. That way, humans get more meat to eat, while chickens lose nothing for it.

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Pshaw...
What name do you plan to give to the chicken?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Let's see, how about Plumpy Chicken?

dataList.title: League of Nine Littérateurs
dataList.content: Dongrang, never try naming things again. Got it?
I may have heard a faint sound at that moment.
It was the sound of a crack.
Knowing well what consequences a minuscule crack could bright about, I chose to look past it...
Perhaps I wanted to pretend that I did not hear it...
Alas, I was careless in my assumption that I could simply observe slantwise as it comes to pass until it has seeped...
Realization comes too late.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: You know, Dongbaek?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Your words weren't particularly reassuring, either.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: It was actually what Nul-in said that gave me an important lesson.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: That no matter how hard I try, if technology doesn't have an immediate use... no one will give it a passing glance...
